duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle customer/client/contra calls, processing client disbursements, customer correspondence, transfer of accounts, wired funds, received/issued checks.
Maintain a high degree of accuracy in data entry and customer service tasks.
Articulate and pleasant telephone manner with excellent verbal and written skills.
Comfortable with direct client interaction and ability to research and resolve client operational issues.
Ensure flexibility in handling customer service activities and networking for issue resolution.
Utilize general PC skills including experience with Word, Excel, and Outlook.
